briefTitle: Multicentre Study to Determine the Feasibility of Using an Integrated Consent Model to Compare Three Standard of Care Regimens for The Treatment of Triple-Negative Breast Cancer in the Neoadjuvant/Adjuvant Setting (REaCT-TNBC)
officialTitle: Multicentre Study to Determine the Feasibility of Using an Integrated Consent Model to Compare Three Standard of Care Regimens for The Treatment of Triple-Negative Breast Cancer in the Neoadjuvant/Adjuvant Setting (REaCT-TNBC) OTT 15-04
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of patients who receive chemotherapy in the neoadjuvant/adjuvant setting for TNBC
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed primary TNBC breast cancer
* Planned for chemotherapy
* ≥18 years of age
* Able to provide verbal consent
* Willing to complete a survey

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic disease
* Contraindication to one or more of the chemotherapy agents being evaluated in the study
